__e: "Ensign Keith seems a fairly bright young man."
No doubt, Keith is an artist !
Look, Keith, I've been meaning to ask you.
Oh, Keith, can I trust you?
You know, Keith, what I've always wondered is with all these ball clubs flying around all season wouldn't you think there'd be a plane crash?
Oh, sod Keith and the bets, mate, listen...
We know we haven't done very well with the holidays and so on and that's not been fair to you or Keith.
- Mr Keith said it was okay.
I hear your friend Keith really blew them away last night at the standup club.
In town last night, everyone was talking about how Keith asked this girl out.
Oh, Keith, you can be so smart, and yet you can be so unthinking!
Keith, you haven't finished your dinner.
